content:
Ja kādam ir interese, var pielikt :+1: un/vai pakomentēt:
https://github.com/organicmaps/organicmaps/discussions/3931

Rigas satiksme (public transportation) integration · Discussion #3931 · organicmaps/organicmaps
When I want to use public transport I have to use site developed by rigas satiksme : https://saraksti.rigassatiksme.lv/index.html#plan/3011/1541,1542 and mostly it is unconvenient to do. As I have ...
Ja pareizi saprotu, labāk būtu salabot OSM datus, nevis mēģināt importēt pieturas no RS?
Man liekas, ka runa nav par pieturām, bet par kursēšanas laikiem.

Pašlaik OSM datos var salikt tikai interval=*, duration=* uz maršruta un opening_hours=* uz pieturām. Tas nav tas. Un pieejamais routing pārsvarā nemāk izmantot sabiedrisko transportu. Ir https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Proposed_features/Public_transport_schedules/Timetable_relations un https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Proposed_features/Public_transport_timetables, bet pat tur ir atzīts, ka

Timetable data, while crucial information, is probably too volatile for adding to OpenStreetMap.

Hmm jā, tur tā nekonkrēti.
"most of stop places are already indexed in the map (some of them are misplaced, mby old database)" mazliet mulsina.
